'''Varunada Lazurite''' are gemstones of varying quality used in the [[Characters#Ascensions|ascension]] of [[character]]s.

Varunada Lazurite is associated with the [[Hydro]] element.

==Types==
{{Material Quality

==Full Description==
"My ideals have no stains."<br />
I must correct you. People here bear no sins in the eyes of the gods... Only laws and the Tribunal can judge someone."<br />
They can judge even me. So praise my magnificence and purity."

==Trivia==
* The item description is narrated by the [[Hydro Archon]].

===Etymology===
*The English name for this item derives "Varunada" from {{w|Varuna}}, a Vedic deity associated with the sky, seas, justice, and truth. In the Hindu Puranas, he is the god of oceans.
*In the Chinese version, "Varunada" is instead {{Lang|mini=1|zh=涤净|zh_rm=Díjìng|zh_tl=Cleansing, Purging}}.
